title: Android SKGLSurfaceView example...
body: Hi been looking for a Android SKGLSurfaceView example project but can only seem to find Forms versions. Anyone able to help?

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I have a set of simple samples:
https://github.com/mattleibow/SkiaSharpDemo/tree/master/SkiaSharpNativeDemo

It contains Forms, Native and Console apps.
